i cannot reproduce this from head. i open two workbench windows, one with an editor open, the other 
with an empty editor area. i also tried with the second window having an open editor (a different file 
than open in the first window).

i drag the editor from the first window to the second, but i cannot get a drop target icon at all. (i can 
only little 'no entry' circle).

darin: maybe i'm missing something, please reopen if i'm confused.

stefan: what should i be allowed to do here re drag/drop? did you 
change something recently, possibly making darin's problem disappear?
I will try on the build tomorrow...I can still reproduce on I20040226.

I can confirm that this is occurring with the build from the 26th. This bug only
applies when dragging over the editor tabs. To reproduce, ensure that both
windows have at least 1 editor open (otherwise, there are no tabs), and drag the
editor over the tabs in the second window.

I fixed identical bugs for the main editor area, view tabs and the fastview bar
recently...
I found the problem. Hope you don't mind if I steal this bug from you, Chris. :-)
i was hoping you might say that.. :)
